command: git commit -am "fix: patch memory leak in auth controller"

breakdown.label: git
breakdown.desc: Version control tool used to track code changes.

breakdown.label: commit
breakdown.desc: Creates a snapshot of your changes.

breakdown.label: "fix:..."
breakdown.desc: A short message explaining the change.

useCases: Quickly commit all changes with a message.
Useful in fast iteration coding sessions.

breakdown.label: -m
breakdown.desc: Runs a Python module as a script.
Port the server will run on.

useCases: NEVER use this in a real system — it's catastrophic.
Educational example of what *not* to do.
Often used in jokes or testing VMs.
